displayName.text: The Boys' Club of New York - Gerry Clubhouse

formattedAddress: 321 E 111th St, New York, NY 10029, USA
adrFormatAddress: 321 E 111th St, New York, NY 10029-3003, USA

originalText.text: Both of my children were members! BCNY WAS THE BEST THING FOR MY FAMILY! I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS CLUB TO ALL BOYS/YOUNG MEN. They provide more than any other after school club, they provide a SAFE HAVEN, ARTISTIC OPPORTUNITIES, SPORTING ACTIVITIES, MENTORING, GAME ROOM ACTIVITIES, SWIMMING, ETC. and YES A TON OF EDUCATIONAL ASSISTANCE TO YOUR CHILD(REN). WHY WOULD YOU WANT YOUR YOUNG MEN TO GO ANYWHERE ELSE??? I LOVE THE BCNY FAMILY!!

text.text: Both of my children were members! BCNY WAS THE BEST THING FOR MY FAMILY! I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS CLUB TO ALL BOYS/YOUNG MEN. originalText.text: Excellent place for the children of their neighborhood. This place keeps them very active offering plenty of activities to take part of and keeps them off the streets. They even educate the kids that go there . They have all types of sports programs and even an indoor pool. The staff are excellent with the children. This place I would highly recommend

text.text: Excellent place for the children of their neighborhood. This place keeps them very active offering plenty of activities to take part of and keeps them off the streets. They even educate the kids that go there . They have all types of sports programs and even an indoor pool. The staff are excellent with the children. This place I would highly recommend

originalText.text: The boys club has a very cool environment and really feels like a giant family. The counselors are very fun and kids will feel a connection to them and the kids there. This place is very inviting and friendly but is held back by small problems that chose to go unnoticed by staff. Scheduling conflicts are somewhat often for in-program activities and certain periods can be killed by time. Basically, im trying to say that the plannig and time handling are a bit sloppy. Overall those problems are overshadowed by the family feel. This program is not in it for the money and you feel that as you spend more time there. I highly recommend this place. Go apply now!

originalText.text: The best place for a 13 year old to be. He has been there since he was 4. They give them a chance to become a kid, child and a young man.

originalText.text: This is the best after school & camp EVER!!!!!!!!!! A GREAT PLACE FOR MY SON TO GET OUT HIS ENERGY AND HAVE AN AWESOME TIME AS WELL AS LEARNING NEW INSTRUMENTS AND DEVELOPING HIS TALENTS AND SKILLS....I COULD NOT BE HAPPIER!!!!!!!!!!! This is the type of place that makes you want to not ever move because you see ur child Happy and safe and having good relationship with the staff, who are EXTREMELY NICE!!!!! If you have a chance ABSOLUTELY SEND YOUR CHILD HERE!!!!!
